wada arthawath ha wada wegawath aarthika prawardhana kshethathrayanhi aayojakayinta sadharana, samanupathika ha paladayi lesa pahasukam salasamin swabhawika, sanskruthika saha pethihasika urumayan suraki des wides sancharaka aakarshanayen wishishta wu menma sawibala ganwana lada welada prajawakin thrupthimath wu madarata prajawage jiwana thathwaya ihala nanwamin jathika aarthikayata dayaka wima.
eeye dinaya wana wita eksath jathika pakshaya thiranayakata pamina thibune owun thaniwa aanduwak pihitu wana bawataya.
samaharawita eekata hethuwa wenna aththe mama owunge kulaye nowana nisa wennathi.
eeta passe usas adhyapana katayuthu iwara karala thamayi nawathath kshethrayata sambandha wune.
eliyata denna oona na ape thiyena dewal.
api danata ee pilibanda sanwadayakata no elambaemu.
siso saha onchilla apa ena thek sitithi.

mehidi rabar ha the wagawe sanwardhanaya wenuwen saha sewakayange subhasadhana katayuthu wenuwen yatithala hasukam diyunu kirima yanadi karyayan kirime hakiyawa labini.2008 warshaye di kurunagala wawili samagame kriyakari adhyakshaka wuweya.wagawata wadi awadhanayak yomu karamin wadi paladawak labaganimata mehidi haki wiya. 2010 k wu mayi masaye di nawatha padinchi kirime amathyanshaya yatathe wu nawatha padinchi kirime adhikariye adhyaksha janaral thanathura ohuta himi wiya.awathan wu janathawage subha siddhiya wenuwen noyek wyapruthi yatathe noyek katayuthu kirime awasthawa mehidi himi wiya.
